narrative.title: Folgore Division - 1942Q3
narrative.situation: Italian Paratrooper Division (Elite Infantry) deployed in North Africa during 1942Q3.
narrative.objectives: Elite airborne infantry employed as ground troops in defensive role
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

supply.notes: Desert supply situation critical; dependent on Axis supply lines across Mediterranean

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Trained for airborne operations but used as elite infantry at El Alamein
Superior physical fitness and marksmanship training
Experienced in individual initiative and small-unit tactics
Equipped with higher proportion of automatic weapons than standard infantry
Trained in demolitions and obstacle clearance

supply_states.notes: Desert supply situation critical; dependent on Axis supply lines across Mediterranean
